learningObjective: In analyzing code, sometimes we need to relate variable values to values remembered at an earlier point in program execution. The Remember construct is useful for this. When using Remember, the value of 'I' at the remembered point is '#I'.
problemStatement: Analyze the following code and state the relationship between the value of 'I' at the end and its remembered value.  Replace /* conditional */ with one of =, <, >, <=, >=.  DO NOT EDIT THE CODE IN ANY OTHER WAY.
